summary: Completed testing of OG Meta Tags and Driver GPS Tracking System. All features verified as WORKING: 1) OG Meta Tags show 'Aircabio - Premium Airport Transfers' for social sharing, 2) Driver Tracking Page loads with trip details and start/stop controls, 3) Admin Tracking Tab shows status, Copy Link, Email Driver, Open Tracking Page buttons, 4) Location updates work with 10-second intervals, 5) PDF report download available.
passed_tests: Backend: OG meta tags present with Aircabio branding - PASS
Backend: No Emergent branding in OG tags - PASS
Backend: GET /api/tracking/session/{token} - returns session details - PASS
Backend: GET /api/tracking/session/{invalid_token} - returns 404 - PASS
Backend: POST /api/tracking/location/{token} - updates driver location - PASS
Backend: POST /api/tracking/control/{token}?action=start - starts tracking - PASS
Backend: POST /api/tracking/control/{token}?action=invalid - returns 422 - PASS
Backend: POST /api/tracking/generate/{booking_id} - requires auth - PASS
Backend: GET /api/admin/tracking/{booking_id} - requires auth - PASS
Backend: GET /api/admin/tracking/{booking_id} - returns tracking data - PASS
Backend: GET /api/admin/tracking - returns active sessions - PASS
Backend: POST /api/tracking/generate/{booking_id} - generates tracking link - PASS
Backend: POST /api/tracking/generate/{booking_id} - returns 400 when no driver - PASS
Backend: GET /api/admin/tracking/{booking_id}/report - requires auth - PASS
Backend: GET /api/admin/tracking/{booking_id}/report - downloads HTML report - PASS

seed_data_creation: Used existing tracking session for booking AC268E66 with token 6eef574a-4baa-41fd-aa6e-67e41fc1c056
context_for_next_testing_agent: OG Meta Tags and Driver GPS Tracking System fully working. Tracking session exists for booking AC268E66 with token 6eef574a-4baa-41fd-aa6e-67e41fc1c056. Driver Tracking Page accessible at /driver-tracking/{token}. Admin can view tracking in BookingViewDialog Tracking tab. Email service has send_driver_tracking_link function. Test credentials: admin@aircabio.com / Aircabio@2024!

og_meta_tags.description: OG meta tags show Aircabio branding for WhatsApp/social sharing
og_meta_tags.verification: HTML contains og:title='Aircabio - Premium Airport Transfers', og:description mentions airport transfer, og:image set, no Emergent branding

driver_tracking_page.description: Driver can view trip details and start/stop tracking
driver_tracking_page.verification: Page loads at /driver-tracking/{token}, shows driver name, booking ref, pickup/dropoff locations, date/time, Start/Stop Tracking buttons, Navigate to Pickup link

admin_tracking_tab.description: Admin can view tracking status and manage tracking links
admin_tracking_tab.verification: BookingViewDialog has Tracking tab with Copy Link, Email Driver, Open Tracking Page buttons, shows LIVE TRACKING/PENDING/COMPLETED status, Latest Location with coordinates, Download Tracking Report button

tracking_link_generation.description: Admin can generate tracking link for bookings with assigned drivers

location_updates.verification: POST /api/tracking/location/{token} updates location, session status changes to active

tracking_report_download.description: Admin can download tracking report as HTML/PDF
tracking_report_download.verification: GET /api/admin/tracking/{booking_id}/report returns HTML report with Aircabio branding
